normal.speaker: Kiara
normal.line: My sis is the best, don't you agree?!

normal.speaker: Kiara
normal.line: I'm training super hard! I'm going to be just as strong as my sis one day!

normal.speaker: Kiara
normal.line: Ugh, standing around is so boring... I wonder what sis is doing.

normal.speaker: Kiara
normal.line: Did you see that move sis pulled in training? SO COOL!

normal.speaker: Kiara
normal.line: I wonder if sis is watching? I've been practicing a new move!

taunt.speaker: Kiara
taunt.line: Huh? Did you just look at my sister without permission!? I’ll end you!

taunt.speaker: Kiara
taunt.line: Don't you dare think of touching my sis! I’ll crush you!!

taunt.speaker: Kiara
taunt.line: You're nothing compared to my sis! So, get out of my sight!!

taunt.speaker: Kiara
taunt.line: *sniff* I wanna be your number one fan! I gotta show you I’m worthy of being your sister!!
